bigitid barn biwundan jah galagid in uzetin.
LUKE 2.13 jah anaks warþ miþ þamma aggilau managei harjis himinakundis hazjandane guþ jah qiþandane:
LUKE 2.14 wulþus in hauhistjam guda jah ana airþai gawairþi in mannam godis wiljins.
LUKE 2.15 jah warþ, biþe galiþun fairra im in himin þai aggiljus, jah þai mans þai hairdjos qeþun du sis misso:
þairhgaggaima ju und Beþlahaim jah saiƕaima waurd þata waurþano, þatei frauja gakannida unsis.
LUKE 2.16 jah qemun sniumjandans jah bigetun Marian jah Iosef jah þata barn ligando in uzetin.
LUKE 2.17 gasaiƕandans þan gakannidedun bi þata waurd þatei rodiþ was du im bi þata barn.
LUKE 2.18 jah allai þai gahausjandans sildaleikidedun bi þo rodidona fram þaim hairdjam du im.
LUKE 2.19 iþ Maria alla gafastaida þo waurda, þagkjandei in hairtin seinamma.
LUKE 2.20 jah gawandidedun sik þai hairdjos mikiljandans jah hazjandans guþ in allaize þizeei gahausidedun jah gaseƕun swaswe rodiþ was du im.
LUKE 2.21 jah biþe usfulnodedun dagos ahtau du bimaitan ina, jah haitan was namo is Iesus, þata qiþano fram aggilau faurþizei ganumans wesi in wamba.

LUKE 2.22 jah biþe usfulnodedun dagos hraineinais ize bi witoda Mosezis, brahtedun ina in Iairusalem, atsatjan faura fraujin, LUKE 2.23 swaswe gamelid ist in witoda fraujins: þatei ƕazuh gumakundaize uslukands qiþu weihs fraujins haitada, LUKE 2.24 jah ei gebeina fram imma hunsl, swaswe qiþan ist in witoda fraujins, gajuk hraiwadubono aiþþau twos juggons ahake.
LUKE 2.25 þaruh was manna in Iairusalem, þizei namo Swmaion, jah sa manna was garaihts jah gudafaurhts, beidands laþonais Israelis, jah ahma weihs was ana imma.
LUKE 2.26 jah was imma gataihan fram ahmin þamma weihin ni saiƕan dauþu, faurþize seƕi Xristu fraujins.
LUKE 2.27 jah qam in ahmin in þizai alh;
jah miþþanei innattauhun berusjos þata barn Iesu, ei tawidedeina bi biuhtja witodis bi ina, LUKE 2.28 jah is andnam ina ana armins seinans jah þiuþida guda jah qaþ:
LUKE 2.29 nu fraleitais skalk þeinana, frauja, bi waurda þeinamma in gawairþja;
LUKE 2.30 þande seƕun augona meina nasein þeina, LUKE 2.31 þoei manwides in andwairþja allaizo manageino, LUKE 2.32 liuhaþ du andhuleinai þiudom jah wulþu managein þeinai Israela.
LUKE 2.33 jah was Iosef jah aiþei is sildaleikjandona ana þaim þoei rodida wesun bi ina.
LUKE 2.34 jah þiuþida ina Swmaion jah qaþ du Mariin, aiþein is:
sai, sa ligiþ du drusa jah usstassai managaize in Israela jah du taiknai andsakanai.
LUKE 2.35 jah þan þeina silbons saiwala þairhgaggiþ hairus, ei andhuljaindau us managaim hairtam mitoneis.
LUKE 2.36 jah was Anna praufeteis, dauhtar Fanuelis, us kunja Aseris;
soh framaldra dage managaize libandei miþ abin jera sibun fram magaþein seinai,
LUKE 2.37 soh þan widuwo swe jere ahtautehund jah fidwor,
soh ni afiddja fairra alh fastubnjam jah bidom blotande fraujan nahtam jah dagam.
LUKE 2.38 soh þizai ƕeilai atstandandei andhaihait fraujin jah rodida bi ina allaim þaim usbeidandam laþon Iairusaulwmos.
LUKE 2.39 jah biþe ustauhun allata bi witoda fraujins, gawandidedun sik in Galeilaian, in baurg seina Nazaraiþ.
LUKE 2.40 iþ þata barn wohs jah swinþnoda ahmins fullnands jah handugeins, jah ansts gudis was ana imma.
LUKE 2.41 jah wratodedun þai birusjos is jera ƕammeh in Iairusalem at dulþ paska.

LUKE 2.42 jah biþe warþ twalibwintrus, usgaggandam þan im in Iairusaulwma bi biuhtja dulþais, LUKE 2.43 jah ustiuhandam þans dagans, miþþane gawandidedun sik aftra, gastoþ Iesus sa magus in Iairusalem, jah ni wissedun Iosef jah aiþei is.
